mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderProduct (pro_number, orderId, count, price) SELECT pro_number, (SELECT MAX(orderId) FROM moodorder), amount, total FROM cate WHERE user_no = #{userno}
INSERT INTO orderProduct (pro_number, orderId, count, price) VALUES (#{pro_number}, #{orderId}, #{count}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT m.name, m.phone, m.id, m.email, m.adr, p.pro_number, p.pro_img1, p.pro_name, p.pro_maindesc, p.pro_maindesctitle, p.pro_price, o.userno, o.price ,o.orderId FROM moodjoin m, moodorder o, product p, orderProduct op WHERE m.no=o.userNo AND o.orderId=op.orderId AND p.pro_number=op.pro_number and #{orderId} = op.orderId ORDER BY op.orderId
